sentences.en: A lot of what has been written about him is inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 关于他的文字描述有大量失实之处。

sentences.en: All the maps we had were wildly inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的地图误差都非常大。

sentences.en: He said these figures were bogus and totally inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 他说这些数字都是捏造的，完全不准确。

sentences.en: It could also be an invalidation notice specifying that part of data should not be considered in the integration process because it is inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 它经常是一个无效的通告，部分的数据集成过程中应该不会被考虑，因为他们是错误的。

sentences.en: It was good drama, but historically inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 戏倒是出好戏, 但与史实有出入.

sentences.en: Maps of the region are notoriously inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,这一地区的地图都不太精确.

sentences.en: Now he noticed that Brown was obviously inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生有什么明显的漏子,现在他也看在眼里了.

sentences.en: The book is both inaccurate and exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 这本书不但不准确，而且夸大其词。

sentences.en: The initial estimate was way out, ie very inaccurate.
The reports were based on inaccurate information.
sentences.cn: 这些报告所依据的是不准确的信息。
这种火箭还相对地不准确.

sentences.en: The workings of these machines are inaccurate.
This is a silly and inaccurate way to think about time, however.
sentences.cn: 然而，这是一种愚蠢和错误的看待时间的方法。

sentences.en: To class Harry Hopkins or even Colonel Donovan with these anonymous small - bore persons is inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 把哈利?霍普金斯或多诺万上校和这类无名小卒列入一类是不准确的.

sentences.en: We know them as inaccurate and misleading property descriptions.
sentences.cn: 我们认为对性状的这些描述是不准确的，且会使人产生误解。

trans.tran_cn: 有错误的，不精密的，不正确的，不准确
